Text: I think you forgot to mention the movie length.
Hey a WHOLE SCENE is missing - between Danny's vision and family's drive to Overlook hotel there is no scene with Danny, his mother and a doctor!
This is the european version. Cut by Kubrick. Shorter than the US version. (3 or 4 shot missing and the doctor's scene missing)

Sigh, found out afterwards that this version has about 20 minutes cut out of it (UK version).

Don't download if you're looking for the North American version.
